item.title: To turnoil pk
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

This was supposed to be in server help he had asked about unarmed combat and I cant find his name now on member list…so yeah here you go

[quote=“Turmoil_PK, post:6, topic:429558”]Please move this section to help :D.
I also changed around clickingbuttons but it didnt change anything.[/quote][code]
case 9125: //Accurate
case 22230://punch
c.fightMode = 0;

case 9126: //Defensive
case 22228: //block (Unarmed)
c.fightMode = 1;

case 9128: //Aggressive
case 22229: //block (unarmed)
c.fightMode = 2;

[/code]

Read full topic
